content.raw:
I like it, looks clean. We'll have to look for a way to expose the top toolbar's color from ign-gui, because right now that's using the primary color. I think this can go on another PR independent of this one.

FYI @ColeOSRF, the color scheme is changing soon. Let us know if you have any concerns, especially when it comes to the icons.
content.html:
I like it, looks clean. We'll have to look for a way to expose the top toolbar's color from ign-gui, because right now that's using the primary color. I think this can go on another PR independent of this one.

FYI @ColeOSRF, the color scheme is changing soon. Let us know if you have any concerns, especially when it comes to the icons.
